text:
Open the book 1968 radical italian design and,
at the end you can find me as the art director

This is TOILETPAPER Paradise,
a place where I’ve spilled spaghetti all over the floor

Turning images into objects.
That’s what I did with Seletti wears TOILETPAPER

Is it possible to capture all Colors together?
I tried, in this book

Imagine a golden vinyl.
I tried to design it

I’ve designed an addictive picture disk.
Take it twice a day

Nothing to wear?
Look what I’ve created with MSGM and TOILETPAPER!

The day I spent with Jeremy Scott, heels for a giantess and
the biggest leather jacket you have ever seen

I celebrated a marriage between Cactus
whose love gave birth to a concept car

I had a desk and some responsibilities in the man
style and design dep. in Dolce e Gabbana
With TOILETPAPER Magazine I’ve hacked an issue of Liberation

The biggest thing I've done
is a billboard over the HIGH LINE

Here you can see me
wearing a pair of shoes i've designed for Santoni
I have an yearly appointment with Seletti catalogs
